name: The Door and the Cap (Ludum dare 51)
name_original: The Door and the Cap (Ludum dare 51)
description:
THEME: Every 10 seconds

The door and the cap is a bullet-hell game, where you need to stay alive for 10 seconds.

This game is the product of 72 hours of work for Ludum Dare 48. Enjoy the game!

IF YOU FEEL STUCK
